overview: In this story-telling, spoken-word program Brody explores his experiences of heartbreak and hope at the intersection of Art and Commerce. An almost Proustian memory play, Brody recalls a lifetime of professional disappointment and disillusionment on the drive to and from what might just be the most important meeting of his career. Hilarious and poignant.

production_companies.name: Purveyor of Fine Words and Phrases

title: Dylan Brody's Driving Hollywood
